name: @itsmaya
description:
Hey everybody, it's @itsmaya with another life update!

How many people can affect one girl's life as she grows up in the American education system? Step into the shoes of influences and role models who must make decisions every day that will affect those around them. Enact policies on the government level to help support those making a change on a personal level. But there's just not enough resources for everything to work out in the end.
